s.text: Even "Republicans" are appalled, the spot suggests, citing a Time magazine article (from 12 years ago).

Clinton's claim in Hold that he has cut taxes for "working families" is based on the Earned Income Tax Credit, which helps the working poor.

The bold red chyrons used in the ad--scarlet letters that appear here and later in the spot--are a chromatic charge of wrongdoing leveled against Dole.
